title: Seven Samurai
description: A veteran samurai, who has fallen on hard times, answers a village's request for protection from bandits. He gathers six other samurai to help him teach the people how to defend themselves, and they wage a desperate battle against the bandits.

title: The 400 Blows
description: A young boy, left without attention, delves into a life of petty crime.

title: 8½
description: A harried movie director retreats into his memories and fantasies.

title: Persona
description: A nurse is put in charge of a mute actress and finds that their personae are melding together.

title: The Seventh Seal
description: A man seeks answers about life, death, and the existence of God as he plays chess against the Grim Reaper during the Black Plague.

title: Tokyo Story
description: An elderly couple visit their children and grandchildren in the city, but receive little attention.

title: Breathless
description: A small-time thief steals a car and impulsively murders a motorcycle policeman. Wanted by the authorities, he reunites with a hip American journalism student and attempts to persuade her to run away with him to Italy.

title: The Rules of the Game
description: A weekend at a marquis's country château lays bare some ugly truths about a group of haut bourgeois acquaintances.

title: Rashomon
description: The rape of a bride and the murder of her samurai husband are recalled from the perspectives of a bandit, the bride, the samurai's ghost and a woodcutter.

title: The Red Shoes
description: A young ballet dancer is torn between the man she loves and her pursuit to become a prima ballerina.
